description.zh-cn: 1923年2月由京汉铁路总工会发动的罢工事件，后因军阀吴佩孚、曹锟等人的武力镇压而失败，导致多人伤亡，史称“二七惨案”。
description.en: A strike initiated by the Beijing-Hankou Railway General Union in February 1923, which was suppressed by force by warlords such as Wu Peifu and Cao Kun, resulting in numerous casualties in what became known as the 'February 7th Massacre'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋军阀直系首领之一，下令武力镇压京汉铁路工人大罢工的关键人物。
description.en: A leader of the Zhili clique of the Beiyang warlords in the Republic of China, a key figure who ordered the violent suppression of the Beijing-Hankou railway workers' strike.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋军阀直系首领之一，参与了对京汉铁路工人大罢工的镇压。
description.en: A leader of the Zhili clique of the Beiyang warlords in the Republic of China, who participated in the suppression of the Beijing-Hankou railway workers' strike.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，京汉铁路总工会江岸分会委员长，罢工领导人之一。因拒绝下令复工，在江岸站被军阀斩首。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Communist Party and chairman of the Jiang'an branch of the Beijing-Hankou Railway General Union, and one of the strike leaders. He was beheaded by warlord forces at Jiang'an Station for refusing to order the workers back to work.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，律师，京汉铁路总工会法律顾问。罢工失败后被捕，后被军阀杀害于武昌。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Communist Party and a lawyer, who served as the legal advisor to the Beijing-Hankou Railway General Union. He was arrested after the strike failed and was subsequently killed by warlords in Wuchang.

description.zh-cn: 时任京汉铁路局局长，配合吴佩孚镇压罢工。1951年在罢工发生地江岸站被公审枪决。
description.en: The director of the Beijing-Hankou Railway Bureau at the time, who collaborated with Wu Peifu to suppress the strike. In 1951, he was publicly tried and executed by firing squad at Jiang'an Station, the site of the strike.

description.zh-cn: 在中国共产党领导下成立的铁路工会组织，是京汉铁路工人大罢工的发起和领导者。
description.en: A railway trade union established under the leadership of the Communist Party of China, which initiated and led the Beijing-Hankou railway workers' strike.

description.zh-cn: 中国执政党，早期工人运动的主要组织者，领导了京汉铁路总工会的建立和罢工斗争。
description.en: The ruling party of China, a key organizer of the early workers' movement, which led the establishment of the Beijing-Hankou Railway General Union and the strike.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年北洋军阀的主要派系之一，由吴佩孚和曹锟领导，是镇压罢工的军事力量。
description.en: One of the main factions of the Beiyang warlords in the early Republic of China, led by Wu Peifu and Cao Kun, and the military force that suppressed the strike.

description.zh-cn: 直系军阀将领，在江岸地区指挥军警镇压罢工，并下令杀害林祥谦。
description.en: A general of the Zhili clique who commanded the military and police to suppress the strike in the Jiang'an area and ordered the killing of Lin Xiangqian.

description.zh-cn: 直系军阀将领，时任湖北督军，接到吴佩孚命令后派遣军队镇压罢工，并下令杀害施洋。
description.en: A general of the Zhili clique, serving as the military governor of Hubei, who dispatched troops to suppress the strike upon receiving orders from Wu Peifu and later ordered the killing of Shi Yang.

description.zh-cn: 负责京汉铁路运营的管理机构，其管理层在罢工中持反对立场。
description.en: The administrative body responsible for the operation of the Beijing-Hankou Railway, whose management opposed the strike.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，参与领导了京汉铁路工人大罢工。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China who participated in leading the Beijing-Hankou railway workers' strike.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，参与领导了京汉铁路工人大罢工。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China who participated in leading the Beijing-Hankou railway workers' strike.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，参与领导了京汉铁路工人大罢工。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China who participated in leading the Beijing-Hankou railway workers' strike.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，参与领导了京汉铁路工人大罢工。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China who participated in leading the Beijing-Hankou railway workers' strike.

description.zh-cn: 京汉铁路总工会委员长，罢工领导人之一。
description.en: Chairman of the Beijing-Hankou Railway General Union and one of the strike leaders.

description.zh-cn: 时任京汉铁路局南段段长，向吴佩孚报告工会活动，参与阻止工会成立。
description.en: The director of the southern section of the Beijing-Hankou Railway Bureau at the time, who reported union activities to Wu Peifu and participated in preventing the union's establishment.

description.zh-cn: 直系军阀将领，时任郑州驻军长官，奉吴佩孚之命阻止京汉铁路总工会成立大会。
description.en: A general of the Zhili clique and the commander of the Zhengzhou garrison, who was ordered by Wu Peifu to prevent the founding conference of the Beijing-Hankou Railway General Union.

description.zh-cn: 时任郑州警察局长，执行阻止京汉铁路总工会成立大会的命令。
description.en: The police chief of Zhengzhou at the time, who carried out the order to prevent the founding conference of the Beijing-Hankou Railway General Union.

nodes.id: 中国第一次工人运动高潮

zh-cn: 中国第一次工人运动高潮
en: First Climax of the Chinese Workers' Movement

description.zh-cn: 1922年初至1923年2月期间，由中国共产党领导的中国工人运动的第一个高潮时期，京汉铁路工人大罢工是其顶点，也标志着其结束。
description.en: The first peak period of the Chinese workers' movement led by the Communist Party of China, from early 1922 to February 1923. The Beijing-Hankou railway workers' strike was its climax and also marked its end.

description.zh-cn: 京汉铁路南段的重要车站，是罢工的中心之一。林祥谦在此处被杀害，赵继贤也在此处被公审。
description.en: An important station on the southern section of the Beijing-Hankou Railway and one of the centers of the strike. Lin Xiangqian was killed here, and Zhao Jixian was also publicly tried here.

description.zh-cn: 林祥谦之弟，在军警镇压罢工时于江岸三道街被杀害。
description.en: Brother of Lin Xiangqian, who was killed at Sandao Street in Jiang'an during the suppression of the strike by military and police forces.

description.zh-cn: 江岸分工会纠察团副团长，在江岸分工会门前与军警搏斗时被枪杀。
description.en: Vice-captain of the picket team of the Jiang'an branch union, who was shot and killed while fighting with military and police forces in front of the branch union office.

description.zh-cn: 长辛店分工会纠察队长，在长辛店惨案中被军警枪杀。
description.en: Captain of the picket team of the Changxindian branch union, who was shot and killed by military and police forces in the Changxindian massacre.

nodes.id: 京汉铁路总工会成立受阻

zh-cn: 京汉铁路总工会成立受阻
en: Obstruction of the founding of the Beijing-Hankou Railway General Union

description.zh-cn: 1923年2月1日，京汉铁路总工会原定在郑州召开的成立大会遭到军阀吴佩孚下令禁止和破坏，成为大罢工的直接导火索。
description.en: On February 1, 1923, the planned founding conference of the Beijing-Hankou Railway General Union in Zhengzhou was banned and disrupted by order of the warlord Wu Peifu, becoming the direct trigger for the general strike.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，参与了京汉铁路工人大罢工。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China who participated in the Beijing-Hankou railway workers' strike.

description.zh-cn: 1951年7月16日，中华人民共和国政府在汉口江岸站举行公审大会，将“二七惨案”的责任人之一赵继贤判处枪决。
description.en: On July 16, 1951, the government of the People's Republic of China held a public trial at Jiangan Station in Hankou, sentencing Zhao Jixian, one of those responsible for the 'February 7th Massacre', to death by firing squad.

relationships.source: 京汉铁路总工会成立受阻

description.zh-cn: 京汉铁路总工会成立大会被军阀强行解散，成为京汉铁路工人大罢工的直接导火索。
description.en: The founding conference of the Beijing-Hankou Railway General Union was forcibly dissolved by warlords, which became the direct trigger for the Beijing-Hankou railway workers' strike.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党组织并领导了京汉铁路总工会，并发动了此次大罢工。
description.en: The Communist Party of China organized and led the Beijing-Hankou Railway General Union and launched this major strike.

description.zh-cn: 京汉铁路总工会是罢工的发起和领导组织。
description.en: The Beijing-Hankou Railway General Union was the initiator and leading organization of the strike.

relationships.source: 中国第一次工人运动高潮

description.zh-cn: 京汉铁路工人大罢工是中国第一次工人运动高潮的一部分和顶点。
description.en: The Beijing-Hankou railway workers' strike was a part and the climax of the First Climax of the Chinese Workers' Movement.

description.zh-cn: 吴佩孚下令调动军队，对罢工工人进行武力镇压，导致罢工失败。
description.en: Wu Peifu ordered the mobilization of troops to violently suppress the striking workers, leading to the failure of the strike.

description.zh-cn: 曹锟作为直系军阀首领之一，参与了对罢工的干涉和镇压。
description.en: As one of the leaders of the Zhili clique, Cao Kun participated in the interference and suppression of the strike.

description.zh-cn: 直系军阀是镇压罢工的主要军事力量。
description.en: The Zhili clique was the main military force that suppressed the strike.

description.zh-cn: 时任京汉铁路局局长赵继贤配合吴佩孚对罢工进行镇压。
description.en: Zhao Jixian, the director of the Beijing-Hankou Railway Bureau at the time, cooperated with Wu Peifu in suppressing the strike.

relationships.target: 京汉铁路总工会成立受阻

description.zh-cn: 吴佩孚在接到赵继贤等人的报告后，下令禁止京汉铁路总工会成立大会的召开。
description.en: After receiving reports from Zhao Jixian and others, Wu Peifu ordered the ban on the founding conference of the Beijing-Hankou Railway General Union.

description.zh-cn: 在江岸站，张厚生因林祥谦拒绝下达复工令而下令将其斩首。
description.en: At Jiang'an Station, Zhang Housheng ordered the beheading of Lin Xiangqian after he refused to issue an order to resume work.

description.zh-cn: 在吴佩孚的命令下，湖北督军萧耀南将已被捕的施洋在武昌杀害。
description.en: Under the orders of Wu Peifu, Hubei military governor Xiao Yaonan killed the arrested Shi Yang in Wuchang.

description.zh-cn: 赵继贤因其在“二七惨案”中的罪行，在1951年于江岸站被公审后枪决。
description.en: For his crimes in the 'February 7th Massacre', Zhao Jixian was publicly tried and executed by firing squad at Jiang'an Station in 1951.

description.zh-cn: 林元成是林祥谦的弟弟。
description.en: Lin Yuancheng was Lin Xiangqian's younger brother.

position.en: Chairman of the Jiang'an Branch Union

description.zh-cn: 林祥谦是京汉铁路总工会江岸分工会的委员长。
description.en: Lin Xiangqian was the chairman of the Jiang'an branch of the Beijing-Hankou Railway General Union.

description.zh-cn: 施洋受聘为京汉铁路总工会的法律顾问。
description.en: Shi Yang was hired as the legal advisor for the Beijing-Hankou Railway General Union.

description.zh-cn: 赵继贤在罢工期间担任京汉铁路局局长。
description.en: Zhao Jixian served as the Director of the Beijing-Hankou Railway Bureau during the strike.

description.zh-cn: 吴佩孚是北洋军阀直系的首领之一。
description.en: Wu Peifu was one of the leaders of the Zhili clique of the Beiyang warlords.

description.zh-cn: 曹锟是北洋军阀直系的首领之一。
description.en: Cao Kun was one of the leaders of the Zhili clique of the Beiyang warlords.
